tasks.title: ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to Mission Control!
tasks.description:
This is your AI-powered task management dashboard.

**Getting Started:**
1. Connect your GitHub account (click the login button)
2. Create your first task with the + button
3. Drag tasks between columns
4. Your AI assistant can update tasks automatically!

**Features:**
- Kanban board with drag & drop
- Subtasks and comments
- Cron job integration
- Real-time sync via GitHub

tasks.title: ðŸ¤– AI Assistant Integration
tasks.description:
Mission Control works with AI assistants like Clawdbot/MoltBot.

**How it works:**
1. Move a task to "In Progress"
2. Your AI receives the work order
3. AI updates the task with progress
4. Task moves to "Review" when done

**Requirements:**
- Clawdbot or compatible assistant
- GitHub webhook configured
- Gateway API access

tasks.title: ðŸ“‹ Use Task Templates
tasks.description:
Create reusable templates for recurring tasks.

**To create a template:**
1. Create a task with all the details
2. Move it to the Templates column
3. Click to duplicate whenever needed

**Use cases:**
- Weekly reports
- Code review checklists
- Onboarding procedures
